Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 1
Description.Text: Situated among attractions & hotels near Brandenburg Gate, one of Berlin's most historic monuments

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 2
Description.Text: Potsdamer Platz - a striking example of the urban renewal, which turned Berlin into the New Berlin

Description.Name: Local Area Highlight 3
Description.Text: Holocaust Memorial - Stunning monument, dedicated to the Jewish victims of World War II

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 1
Description.Text: Enjoy newly refurbished modern guestrooms, including 349 Deluxe and 21 Superior hotel rooms.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 2
Description.Text: Eight Executive Berlin hotel suites and one Capital suite stylishly furnished for a memorable stay.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 3
Description.Text: Amenities include spacious work areas with Internet access, climate control, mini-bar and lounge.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 4
Description.Text: Elegant bedding features down comforters, custom duvets, crisp linens and piles of plush pillows.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 5
Description.Text: Premier among Berlin hotel rooms, enjoy dual-voltage outlets, large wardrobe and iron/ironing board.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights 6
Description.Text: Bathrooms are designed in natural stone with hair dryers, bathrobes and illuminated makeup mirror.

Description.Name: Guest Room Highlights
Description.ListItem: Enjoy newly refurbished modern guestrooms, including 349 Deluxe and 21 Superior hotel rooms.
Eight Executive Berlin hotel suites and one Capital suite stylishly furnished for a memorable stay.
Amenities include spacious work areas with Internet access, climate control, mini-bar and lounge.
Elegant bedding features down comforters, custom duvets, crisp linens and piles of plush pillows.
Premier among Berlin hotel rooms, enjoy dual-voltage outlets, large wardrobe and iron/ironing board.
Bathrooms are designed in natural stone with hair dryers, bathrobes and illuminated makeup mirror.

Description.Name: Description
Description.Text: Fusing contemporary chic with classic elegance, the newly refurbished Berlin Marriott Hotel, ideally located at the Potsdamer Platz, Berlin business district and in walking distance from this vibrant core of the historic Brandenburg Gate in Berlin.

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Fusing contemporary chic with classic elegance, the newly renovated Berlin Marriott Hotel is ideally located at Potsdamer Platz, Berlin's business district, and is within walking distance from the vibrant core of the historic Brandenburg Gate. Offering a relaxing experience in sophisticated atmosphere, we are one of the premier downtown Berlin hotels. After a day of business or sightseeing, relax with a swim in the contemporary wellness area with a 24-hour fitness gym or jog at the Tiergarten, just seconds from our modern hotel. As one of the most unforgettable hotels in Berlin, our two Executive Level floors offer exclusivity and privacy, panoramic views, and free breakfast, snacks, open bar and Wi-Fi. For your comfort, we serve breakfast until 3 p.m. on Saturday and Sunday in our main restaurant, Midtown Grill. To round off your day, the first fashion bar in Germany, CATWALK Bar, provides the perfect place for fashion lovers and connoisseurs to enjoy imaginative cocktails and fanciful snacks.

Description.Name: Sales Message
Description.Text: The Berlin Marriott Hotel is located at the Potsdamer Platz. The hotel is within walking distance to several Berlin sightseeing highlights, such as the Brandenburg Gate and Sony Center in Berlin.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 1
Description.Text: Our Berlin hotel at Potsdamer Platz makes it easy to experience some of the city's finest shopping, dining and attractions.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 2
Description.Text: A newly renovated smoking lounge and our chic lobby lounge offer plenty of options for relaxing throughout the day.

Description.Name: Top Selling Feature 3
Description.Text: Discover the hottest new venue in the capital, our Berlin Potsdamer Platz hotel's fashion bar - CATWALK by Michalsky.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 1
Description.Text: Boasting innovative designs, our meeting rooms in Berlin offer flexibility for events of all sizes.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 2
Description.Text: Host successful gatherings for up to 650 persons from our chic 6,565 square foot Grand Ballroom.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 3
Description.Text: Enjoy high tech services and a relaxed atmosphere inside our naturally lighted Berlin meeting rooms.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 4
Description.Text: Exceptional event menus are designed to inspire and may be customized to meet your specific needs.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our business hotel in Berlin boasts luxury accommodations and on-site dining to accent any occasion.

Description.Name: Business/Group Highlight 6
Description.Text: Event planners may download MeetingMatrixÂ® Certified Diagrams to aid their planning process.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 1
Description.Text: Make wedding day dreams come true at our chic venues in Berlin with capacity for up to 600 guests.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 2
Description.Text: Our Marriott certified event planners are trained to ensure every detail is perfectly executed.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 3
Description.Text: Our Berlin wedding venues, fine service and professional catering facilitate an unforgettable day.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 4
Description.Text: Choose from a long list of impressive event menus or customize our services to meet your needs.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 5
Description.Text: Our Berlin hotel offers specialty lighting to create a personalized atmosphere for your wedding.

Description.Name: Property Social Event Meeting Highlight 6
Description.Text: Book a block of rooms for the convenience of those attending your wedding reception or social event.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Great steaks, chops and seafood top the menu at this American-style steakhouse in the heart of Berlin. Guests enjoy savory entrees along with a friendly atmosphere and exceptional service accented with an open kitchen and outdoor bar seating.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A vibrant destination, the chic new CATWALK is the first and only fashion bar in Berlin. Offering innovative drinks and live DJs, the trendy bar's exciting atmosphere is creating a reputation in Berlin for its unique atmosphere and fine service.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: A great place to relax either by yourself or with friends, the Lobby Lounge features a bar for classic evening drinks and tasty fare for breakfast and lunch. Enjoy a cup of coffee, free Wi-Fi and social networking.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Authentic gourmet French brasserie dates back to 1875. Guests may enjoy typical French and regional cuisine within a cozy and frankly atmosphere.

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: French boulevard restaurant in the art deco style with many art works of the 20th century

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Vegetarian dishes served in stylish, hip environment

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Luxurious, old-world charm surround fine continental dining

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Light, low-calorie variations on classic meals served in warm atmosphere

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: International, German restaurant in a relaxed and comfortable flair

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Fine Dining restaurant in the heart of Berlin. Meeting the tastes of a European metropolis

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: World-wide influences restaurant acting on a basis of classic central European and Berlin styles

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: When Kuchi opened in Charlottenburg in the early 2000s, it was hailed as the "szene" of all Japanese joints raw fish served with a modern twist

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Asian live cooking restaurant with a modern and fresh style of asian fast-food

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description
RestaurantDescription.Text: Classic Italian cuisine, exquisite wines and a stylish ambience combine to create the setting for a true experience on a culinary level

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description

RestaurantDescription.Name: Restaurant Short Description

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take the Bus X9 and get off at Zoologischer Garden then take the subway U2 towards Pankow and get off at Potsdamer Platz.

Description.Name: Driving Instructions from Airport
Description.Text: Take the train S45 to S-Bahnhof Suedkreuz. Then change to the S-train S2 and get off at Potsdamer Platz.

Description.Name: List All Special Guest Priviledges Available at Fitness Center
Directions to Highway from Property
Description.Text: Turn off at exit Kaiserdamm following the directions to city centre Zentrum. This will lead you onto the street Kaiserdamm. Continue straight on along Bismarckstrasse and Strasse des 17. Juni, Passing two roundabouts. 500 m before the Brandenburg Gate turn right into Entlastungsstrasse. After about 300 meters, at the first traffic light, turn left into Bellevuestrasse. Drive straight ahead and turn left into Auguste-Hauschner-Strasse. You will see the Berlin Marriott Hotel on the right hand side of the Inge-Beisheim-Platz.

Description.Name: Directions from Highway to Property
Description.Text: From the Hotel garage (Ebertstrasse) take you left until the Brandeburg Gate. Turn left into "Strasse des 17. Juni" passing to rounabouts. Go straight ahead until you see the highway on your left side ("Kaiserdamm")

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: Book Air + Hotel Together and Save!

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: When you book with Vacations by Marriott, your perfect vacation to our German capital is just a click away. Enjoy fantastic savings by booking air & hotel packages. Vacations by Marriott is the only place you can book air + hotel and earn your Marriott Rewards points.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: At Marriott we know that every planned meeting, event or wedding is unique, from preferences and tastes to event sizes. Knowing that, we would like to hear from you to create a individual offer for you. Contact us directly at bso.berlin@marriotthotels.com or Tel. +49 (0)30 22000 2200.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: At Marriott we know that every planned meeting, event or wedding is unique, from preferences and tastes to event sizes. Knowing that, we would like to hear from you to create a individual offer for you. Contact us directly at bso.berlin@marriotthotels.com or Tel. +49 (0)30 22000 2200.

TPA_Ext_MessageType.Title: UPGRADE: Enhance your next stay now.

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: While staying at the Berlin Marriott Hotel, feel free to ask our front desk staff for a high floor: these guest rooms will provide you with a breathtaking view over the Berlin skyline and the most famous monuments of the German capital. (fee may apply)

Description.Name: Message Text
Description.Text: Book an event now during July and August 2014 at the newly refurbished Berlin Marriott Hotel and receive not only Marriott Reward points. Send us your inquiries to bso.berlin@marriotthotels.com. We are looking forward to hearing from you.

Description.Name: Value proposition 1
Description.Text: Great city center location at Potsdamer Platz, only 30 minutes from both airports (Tegel and Schoenefeld), only 5 minutes from main train station. Subway and train station. Lots of sights nearby, e.g. Brandenburg Gate, Boulevard âUnter den Lindenâ

Description.Name: Value proposition 2
Description.Text: Good room / meeting room ration with 379 renovated guest rooms and meeting space for up to 600 persons. Meeting rooms range from 290 sq ft â 6.565 sq ft.

Description.Name: Value proposition 3
Description.Text: Recently renovated lobby & lobby lounge, Cigar Lounge, Catwalk Bar, health club & fitness area.Newly renovated hotel rooms (new furniture, new bathroom, new carpet etc.)

Description.Name: Value proposition 4
Description.Text: City continues to evolve as upcoming destination for young and innovative entrepreneurs, especially fashion, lifestyle, entertainment segment.

Description.Name: Group Description
Description.Text: Berlin is not only the seat of government, but also fashion centre, capital of fairs and a popular venue for events. In the Berlin Marriott Hotel, your symposia, conferences and congresses will be a guaranteed success. A flexible divisible ballroom measuring 6.566 sq ft and accommodating up to 600 people, a lightbathed foyer for receptions with up to 350 persons as well as further conference rooms for 10 to 35 persons, offer a sophisticated ambience with state-of-the-art technology for every kind of event.

Description.Name: Sales strategy
Description.Text: Focus segments: Sepcial Corporate, Government (Transient & Groups), Corporate Group (e.g. Pharmaceutical Business, Consulting, Entertainment)

Description.Name: Property Description Long
Description.Text: Das neu renovierte Berlin Marriott Hotel empfÃ¤ngt seine GÃ¤ste mit einer Kombination aus modernem Chic und zeitgenÃ¶ssischer Eleganz! Ideal am Potsdamer Platz gelegen, befinden Sie sich hier in unmittelbarer NÃ¤he vieler historischer SehenswÃ¼rdigkeiten, von erstklassigen Einkaufs- sowie UnterhaltungsmÃ¶glichkeiten. Auch die Verkehrsanbindung an alle wichtigen Bereiche von Berlin ist hervorragend. Wir bieten Ihnen persÃ¶nlichen und aufmerksamen Service und die Umgebung eines der besten Hotels in Berlin. Entspannen Sie nach einem Arbeitstag oder einer Stadtbesichtigung in unserem modernen Wellness-Bereich und Schwimmbad, inklusive einem rund um die Uhr geÃ¶ffneten Fitnessstudio. Das Haus bietet Ihnen auch eine Executive Lounge in der Sie exklusiv, mit Panoramablick, FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck, Snacks & Drinks ganztÃ¤gig verwÃ¶hnt werden. Im Restaurant Midtown Grill servieren wir Ihnen die besten Steaks Berlins und am Wochenende ein umfangreiches FrÃ¼hstÃ¼ck bis 15.00h. Am Abend ist die Fashion Bar CATWALK, der ideale Ort fÃ¼r Fashionistas und Liebhaber von originellen Cocktail-Kreationen.
